pageProduct.name: Schick Xtreme 3 Pivot Ball Hybrid Mens Disposable Razor 5pk
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The Schick Xtreme 3 Pivot Ball with 3 flexible blades and pivot ball technology adapts perfectly to your unique contours for extreme closeness & comfort.

  • 3 flexible blades allow you to optimize contact with the skin
  • The pivot ball technology gently moves from side to side adapting to the contours of your face
  • Easy rinse design helps keep blades from clogging
  • Practical travel cap to keep your razor safe and clean when you're on the go
  • Great value with one handle and five blades in each pack
Adapts to contours

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

Blades are sharp tools, handle with care. Do not touch blade head with fingers when you change cartridge. Change cartridge immediately if dropped on the floor. Do not re-assemble or dismantle the cartridge. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Gel strip contains Aloe, Vitamin E, and Pro-Vitamin B5

Directions

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
